name: Love Triangle (pbnjohnny, rizuki17, MessC, Teo Lee)
name_original: Love Triangle (pbnjohnny, rizuki17, MessC, Teo Lee)
description:
After meeting Stella, the game's main character, these two players battle it out in order to snatch her heart. Whoever comes out first with their (certainly not randomized) way of words is the true victor.

CONTROLS

At least one controller is required to play! This game is meant for two controllers as it uses the D-Pad and buttons for game play. 

CREDITS

Theodore Lee - Main team lead, Programmer, Game Player Designer, Audio

Johnny Ngo - Second team lead, Programmer, Art (inspired by Stardew Valley), UI Designer

Jing Hu - Programmer, Bug Tester

Nam-Giao Nguyen - Programmer, Game Play Tester, Storywriter

Adrienne Caparaz - Game Play Tester, Storywriter
